John:

Thanks for the info!...quite a resource; I saved it for future 
reference.

I worked with the tanto yesterday and was able to bring up some 
midare utsuri...mainly on one side.

Thanks again,
Ron

--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "John Small nagelgone" 
<saemonjonosuke@h...> wrote:
> Hello Ron,
> 
> It is always difficult to judge a sukesada.
> For my feeling the blades is not from eisho period.
> 
> I have a very big database,,, so maybe this will help you to 
search and 
> study the koto Sukesada.
> Greetings,
> John Klein Nagelvoort
> The Netherlands
>
